enabled.title: Whether the quality assessment is enabled or not

r01.title: TSR1 - Clearly Defined Context (*)
r01.description: Description of use cases for the project. (Required)

r02.title: TSR2 - Use of Appropriate Data
r02.description: Links to data that was used to create, validate, test, etc. the project.

r03.title: TSR3a - Verification
r03.description: Link to test suite for project.

r03b.title: TSR3b - Verification Results
r03b.description: Link to test results from running the tests for the project, e.g., on the o²S²PARC platform.

r03c.title: TSR3c - Evaluation Within Context
r03c.description: Link to scientific validation (experimental comparator), sensitivity analysis and uncertainty quantification for the project in the context of the use cases described in TSR1.

r04.title: TSR4 - Explicitly Listed Limitations (*)
r04.description: Link to documentation of known issues and limitations of the project. (Required)

r05.title: TSR5 - Version Control
r05.description: Link to primary forge repository for the project. For example, o²S²PARC, github, or gitlab instance.

r06.title: TSR6 - Adequate Documentation (*)
r06.description: Link to user and/or developer documentation for the project. (Required)

r07.title: TSR7a - Broad Dissemination: Releases
r07.description: Link to the download or release page for the project, e.g., on the SPARC Portal.

r07d.title: TSR7d - Broad Dissemination: Packages
r07d.description: Link to language ecosystem package repository. For example, PyPI for python projects.

r07e.title: TSR7e - Broad Dissemination: Interactive
r07e.description: Link to the project on an interactive software hosting platform e.g. o²S²PARC.

r08.title: TSR8a - Independent Reviews
r08.description: Links to reviews of project by independent members of the community.

r08b.title: TSR8b - External Certification
r08b.description: Link to external certification of project.

r09.title: TSR9 - Competing Implementation Testing
r09.description: Link to benchmarking against other projects operating in the same domain.

r10.title: TSR10a - Relevant standards
r10.description: List and/or link to standards/guidelines that this project conforms to or implements.

r10b.title: TSR10b - Standards Adherence
r10b.description: Link to demonstration that project conforms to standard.
